website_summaries.verdict: A unique ladle that offers a combination of user-friendly features, and unfortunately comes with some durability issues.
pros: Features a 12.5-inch stainless steel handle with a deep silicone top that won't scratch non-stick surfaces and is slightly flexible for scraping food from pots
CoolGrip handle resists temperatures up to 450°F
cons: Silicone top has been known to separate from the handle
washing it in the dishwasher may reduce longevity

customer_reviews.title: not meant to last
customer_reviews.text: metal split and rust after less than a year of light use
customer_reviews.author: Prison Mike

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this! I have been getting very frustrated with plastic ladles that are awkward to use because they are poorly shaped or the size of the bowl makes them unwieldy to use...then I found this & it's perfect. Well-made, easy to get even the last bit out of the pot and safe to use with my non-stick cookware, who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: Rae Koziczkowski

customer_reviews.title: Kudos Cooler Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ladle! Great design...performs better than I expected. I read the description regarding it's design and I was skeptical, but bought it anyway. Upon examination it seemed like pretty much like any other Silicone utensil out there..but it is not It does exactly what it was designed to do.. Not only did it serve my stew nicely...it got into the corners/edges and cleaned the sides of the Dutch oven that I made it in. NOTHING like any other Silicone utensil I have used...its my go to ladle now! I hope they make some with extra long handles (and colors)...for deep soup/stock pots
customer_reviews.author: kb_1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Now my pans and pots won't be covered in scratches anymore. Great product for the value. I reccomend it to all cooks or kitchen addicts who want to keep their utensils neat. I would have appreciated it more if the silicone part was white or red because the black makes the food a bit unappetizing while serving the food but other than that it is a great product. Don't miss it. The sellers are quite responsive to anything you want to tell them about the product and I loved the fact that they were a small family operated business. You've got my support!
customer_reviews.author: Ledio Lila

customer_reviews.title: Gets every last drop!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this gets every little bit of whatever is in my pot! I use this for my Dutch oven for stew or soup, beef stroganoff etc. It’s flexible, so it makes it so easy to get all the liquid. Seems sturdy, easy to clean. I’ve only used it a bunch of times. So glad I got this one!
customer_reviews.author: bernie

customer_reviews.title: Made to last
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, easy-to-use ladle. I got it because I wanted something that would be small enough and straight enough to serve soup from a Chinese takeout tub. This fits the bill. It is designed for kitchen use so is not elegant for the dinner table. But if we cared about elegant, we wouldn’t be serving at the table from a takeout container, would we?
customer_reviews.author: PA Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great for scraping edges
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Love how the silicone edge scrapes the sides of the pot down so well!! No more reaching in with a spoon to get all those last bits. This ladle acts almost like a spatula! I took off a star because the ladle is quite heavy, so when I’m doing a lot of serving, it does get a little hard on my arm. But I would still highly recommend this as a very unique, useful ladle!!
customer_reviews.author: amazon

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this ladle but so far no go
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this ladle but so far no go. Some of the silicone was worn off on one side (not sure if this was what it was supposed to do?) & it didn’t scrape the bottom like all of the other reviews stated. It was a bust. I’m giving it 2 stars only because the customer service seems over the top with checking in after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: The handle is 9 inches long not 13 inches.
customer_reviews.text: It says in the description that the handle is 13 inches long and it's only 9 inches. False advertising! And it's not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Soup ladle is very well constructed, works just fine. Nice handle to grip. The silicone bowl won't scratch any of my pots/pans. Very pleased with purchase. When I left shipping feedback for the seller, I received a personal email from seller to thank me, which I thought was really good PR on the part of this company.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: The material is flimsy and rips easily
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for two months and it’s already ripped at the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last as long as expected
customer_reviews.text: Split after a little over a year. Was a good size ladle, seemed well made. Not sure what happened but looked after washing it and it has split open.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Quality silicone ladle
customer_reviews.text: I just bought new stainless steel cookware and was looking for products that would be safe and not scratch my new pots and pans. This ladle has worked wonderfully. An added bonus is how nice the ladle looks. I would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Halle

customer_reviews.title: So compact
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I’ve ordered—one is a temporary night stand in my spare room and the other two are great for outside. I just love these; they’re easy to fold up and put away, easy to clean, and I use them all over.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: the handle is made with stainless steel that feels cheap to the touch, the plastic cup part feels cheap too. Who knows when these are going to melt, its made in China, not US -- which is falsely advertised. Should cost $1 not $10.
customer_reviews.author: Duy Hoang

customer_reviews.title: A Work of Art!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ladle to use with making encaustic wax and paint but it's so beautiful, I'm going to give it to a friend who loves to share her home made soup with me. I love the flexible silicone cup part and the quality is so high in my view that it could be called "a work of art".
customer_reviews.author: JeanBFitzgeraldArtCrafts

customer_reviews.title: Best ladle ever
customer_reviews.text: Glad to review this product. Sturdy. Made well. The best attribute is that it washes clean. No scraping with your fingernails. My other "Pampered" spoons and landless do not clean well at all. Thanks to Cooler Kitchen. I will purchase more of your products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more Rusty Ladle for ME!
customer_reviews.text: I love my ladle. It looks nice. It works perfectly. I had been using a nasty old rusty ladle and was happy to toss it in the garbage. This also has a nice little hook for hanging if you so desire. Shipment came very fast and I would definitely buy from this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Ladle
customer_reviews.text: Great, great ladle. Perfect size. So happy with this purchase. Arrived on time, in great condition. Did not disappoint. I believe it comes in a larger size for you folks who might think 4 oz. is too small. However, I was shocked how big it really is. Again, great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Feather Baby Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just used this to serve some Guinness braised shirt ribs. Love this! Easy to clean and doesn’t scratch up my Le Creuset dutch oven. Nice portion sizes per scoop as well. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: A surprising improvement on the standard ladle
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the difference the flat front makes. It's easy to get all of the soup (or whatever) out of the pan, as the ladle hugs the side of the pan. The silicon is non-stick and cleans easily in the dishwasher, and it looks good hanging on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyone's kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Way better than the plastic ones. Great deal! Shipped fast! The silicone cup has metal inside to keep it stiff. And the edges are soft silicone to scrape with.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ladle
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Like it. Like its looks, too.
customer_reviews.author: jnanam

customer_reviews.title: Almost perect?
customer_reviews.text: The bowl of the ladle and the construction/quality are great. But the handle is ergonomically way wrong for me. It's a bit too short for my pots of soup, and the end of the handle (metal hook part) jabs my palm. I'm attempting to return it (rejected, but maybe return time was less than a month)?
customer_reviews.author: Ila Howard

customer_reviews.title: Hefty boi
customer_reviews.text: It can handle anything. Heavy stew, sauces, soups...ladle is crazy sturdy and easy to clean. Go ahead and buy it. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Zabethlyburn

customer_reviews.title: thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Just doesn’t seem to ‘ladle’ very well. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great ladle
customer_reviews.text: We needed an easy to use ladle for the pizza sauce when we make pizzas and this worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Enamel Cast Iron
customer_reviews.text: Needed a non-metal ladle for my enamel cast iron. This has been working great. Big scoops. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great silicon tip but differs from standard steel ladels.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just be aware that a silicon spoon won't be as sturdy as steel. A great product if used correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Quazi M.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than Regular Ladel
customer_reviews.text: Light. Looks pretty. I know it says 4 oz., but 4 oz. is really small. It takes a lot of scoops to full up a small soup bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Gavriella

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Came just in time to scoop out my chili! I love the flatter front and how it conforms to the side of the skillet so you can get every drop.
customer_reviews.author: S H

customer_reviews.title: ... received the ladle on a timely basis and in great shape. Have used it several times already and ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the ladle on a timely basis and in great shape. Have used it several times already and would rate it ‘two thumbs up”. It’s good looking and I like the weight of it. The flexible edges really do help with scraping the sides and bottom of the soup pan. It cleans up very easily. It replaced a plastic ladle that I cringed every time I used it in hot soups.
customer_reviews.author: MJSmock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the other positive reviews and was not disappointed. My wife agrees.
customer_reviews.author: doubleganger

customer_reviews.title: Shape of ladle cup makes easy pouring.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight - handle feels hollow. Deep enough ladle with no scratch silicone. Easy to pour from several directions. I’m using it for gravy, soups, or cider...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have only used 1 time so far but I love the silicone "bowl" part of the ladle
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and is just as pictured. Have only used 1 time so far but I love the silicone "bowl" part of the ladle. Very easy to use and store.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bachman

customer_reviews.title: It's a great ladle and the handle stays cool.
customer_reviews.text: The handle does stay cool and feels good in your hand. It holds 1/2 cup which makes it great for measuring out serving sizes of soups.
customer_reviews.author: L. Forrer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good quality spoon
customer_reviews.text: Saw this ladle as a paired item with a stock pot I ordered. It is a good quality spoon, though the handle is not as long as expected, being that it was recommended with a 14" tall pot. And when I tried to return it and look for a longer handled ladle, I found that it is not qualified for return.
customer_reviews.author: Marceous

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and Function Unite!
customer_reviews.text: This classy ladle is not only attractive but also VERY functional, having a flat front side that allows the cook to scrape every last bit of goodness from the cooking pot when serving. Nice additiion to our kitchen essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Just the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Just the perfect size. I needed something that wouldn't scratch my non-stick pans. I make a lot of jams and jellies. These are perfect for filling my jars with the hot fruit.
customer_reviews.author: DQ2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ladle
customer_reviews.text: The perfect ladle for your finest cookware. It's functional and won't scratch any surface. Well made and just plain pretty to look at. I highly recommend this ladle.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The silicone is easy to clean and the flat edge makes getting the last drop of liquid from the pot easy. Product arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: T Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Best ladle I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best ladle I've ever owned. After receiving mine, I bought one for a friend. Just yesterday I had to buy "just one more" in case we served more than one soup at a time. It scoops beautifully, pours accurately and cleans up like a charm. This may be the one gift I give to all of my friends who cook.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Plan to use it a lot with all my vegan soups / stews I'll be making! It's the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Lynndzee

customer_reviews.title: meets or exceeds your expectations
customer_reviews.text: reaches well into deep pots or bowls without having to worry about damaging the finish of non-stick pots
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Quality materials and seems like it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quality materials and seems like it is going to last a loooong time. The silicone provides great flexibility when using. Should’ve bought two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ladle
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it at least once a week since we got it a little over a month ago, and it's done exactly what we needed so far with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Beth R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: I love this item because it's heat resistant and does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I had originally written that the item gad not been received, but it was. My husband removed it from the mailbox before I saw it. I love this item because it's heat resistant and does not scratch my very expensive coated pots.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine day

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Scooped it UP!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to make working with sticky marshmallow syrup easier, and it works great! Especially love that the flexible edges allow you to scrape out the last bit of sticky goodness! Great product, perfect service.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Carrison

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found it.
customer_reviews.text: Silicone ladles that are made well are hard to find. Glad I found this one, already used it a few times. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for portion control
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have a 1/2 cup measurement when we are trying to work on portion control. Very helpful! Had to get two!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Looks dirty.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t seem to be able to keep white spots off of it after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Mann

customer_reviews.title: Silcone soup spoon
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift and I have not used it. I was told they like it.
customer_reviews.author: mysticview

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It's beautiful, and practical. Seller was excellent, too. The ladle arrived on time and in perfect condition. I plan to buy more to give as gifts. Love the silicone cup; so gentle on my cookware!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Soup Ladle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for an upcoming Chili contest. So, I have not used them yet, but they seem a good size and look well crafted. They were delivered on time as promised.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas s cameron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it’s flexibility, giving easy access to the side of container. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this ladle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife after our plastic one broke. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: It's a ladle
customer_reviews.text: I am reviewing a ladle. If you don't know what this is, it's a ladle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Last ladle you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: No more clanking a metal ladle into the side of a metal pop trying to get that gravy (or whatever) out. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rosenblum

customer_reviews.title: Good Ladles, I like them.
customer_reviews.text: Great ladles !! I bought two for my mom, and they work well, I am pleased. I hope they last a lifetime. They have a bit of flex in the silicone ladle end to get the soup out of the bottom of the pan, and they clean up well, so I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Sarff

customer_reviews.title: Love my ladle
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, good price, just starting to switch to silicone utensils, will be buying many from here because of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: K. S. Case

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: It's great just what I expected. Just the right size
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Ladle
customer_reviews.text: Love this ladle, handle stays cool, large enough ladle to hold a good portion, easy to clean. A must for any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: It's a ladle. It puts stiff in bowls... Easy peasy
customer_reviews.author: Paul Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good choicw
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough. Don’t know yet about sturdiness only a few months in.
customer_reviews.author: DJMD

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet sturdy. The ladle is flexible
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight yet sturdy. The ladle is flexible, not stiff, which means it can get into where the wall means the floor of the pan; getting the last bits of sauce or whatever. Been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: a potter

customer_reviews.title: Great ladle without fat handle
customer_reviews.text: This ladle is what I was looking for. It's a bit difficult to find kitchen utensils without fat handles -- I prefer thinner handles so that I can fit more spoons, spatulas, etc. into my utensil holder. And I liked that I could buy this ladle without having to purchase a whole set.
customer_reviews.author: HY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design!  Every cook deserves this ladle :)
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found this new design! And BPA free! I can get to all soup or stew on the bottom of the soup pot and not worry about scratching my cookware. Very well made. A MUST for every kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: C K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good length for use in a dutch oven. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha Christie

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This product does deliver what the description said. I would definitely buy again IF this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: gearie cruz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome ladle. It allows you to scrape every last bit of soup or chili or whatever you have in the pot. I love it and don't even see the need for any of my other ladles. 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ladle
customer_reviews.text: The silicone part is flexible so it was easy to ladle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladel
customer_reviews.text: Thus is a nice ladel, it cleans nicely and serves well. Definitely a good kitchen Utensile.
customer_reviews.author: Ch Ho

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product! I have used it multiple times in the last few months since I purchased it and it is a durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany DiDomenico

customer_reviews.title: High quality utensil
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and appears to be of good quality. It is exactly what I expected when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica V

customer_reviews.title: I love this ladle!
customer_reviews.text: Wonder ladle! It is well made out of good materials. The ladle is sturdy and the silicon has just enough pliability to scoop up every last drop
customer_reviews.author: Holea

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be longer and larger. It is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting clad kitchenware, all around excellent ladel
customer_reviews.text: The ladle has been pretty much perfect, used it to cook and fill 120+ jars of jam this weekend. The ability to scrape the entire pot without lifting, leaning or having to touch the hot cookware was great, it saved me having to dirty another spatula. It also made it safer to use my all-clad dutch oven without worrying about scraping the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and they have all been great. Will keep buying from this seller when ever ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few items from Cooler Kitchen, and they have all been great. Will keep buying from this seller when ever I need an item they carry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ladle is great - seems quite well made a flexible. Very good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K.

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Ladle!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy two of these, because I was constantly frustrated if this ladle was sitting in the dishwasher and I had to use another one. Nothing compares with this ladle. It's in constant use. In fact, I might just get a third!
customer_reviews.author: Anne from Arlington, VA

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladle
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for serving soup, and it cleans like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: T. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made product I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Ladle
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful ladle! Just the right size and the flexible bowl makes getting into corners very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Looks great too!
customer_reviews.text: High end silicone ladle scoop and stainless steel handle...Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Susan at the Beach

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Does exactly what it claims!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect 5/5. This ladle is of great quality, and really does grab every last drop/crumb/blob at the bottom of the bowl. Would buy from this line again, and have already recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It does a great job. Washes well too.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. Will highly recommend for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: lightweight & easy to use/clean
customer_reviews.text: lightweight & easy to use/clean. would recommend especially for nonstick pots--no chance of scratching. a great product! what else does Cooler Kitchen offer?
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: I liked it a lot immediately
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a nylon ladle with this ladle. I liked it a lot immediately. It is light weight and easy to cook miso soup and to scoop soup. I have not used other ladles at all since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this ladle. Stays cool in the pot when I make chili on the wood stove.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ladle!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ladle! I've looked for a new ladle for a while and this one works in my kitchen perfectly. I love that it works as a spatula too and doesn't scratch the non-stick surfaces of my pots. Great design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This company stands behind their product
customer_reviews.text: This ladle is well made especially the handle which is made of probably stainless steel
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised from my perspective
customer_reviews.text: I like this as just a ladle, but this was advertised as being more capable of getting everything out of the pot because of how flexible the silicone is. I suppose my stock pot is just too tall to be able to use it like they are advertising. I also believe that the connection between stainless steel and silicone might be a breeding ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzman Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: The silicone cup does not scratch the bottom of pot compare to our previous metal cup, light weight handle, less soup or stew sticking to cup and it's easier to clean up. Great kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.author: Maverick E Cortejo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ladle and the rubberized edge allows you to scoop up every last drop.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Lopane

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. Wish I would of gotten one a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 69 years young and have been wanting one of these for years. We're remodeling my kitchen and thought it was about time I updated my utensils as well. I absolutely love it. Wish I would of gotten one a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Donna R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, and the sellers were very quick to communicate with any questions. The ladle is just what I was hoping it would be, not too flimsy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Works well even though it would be slightly easier to use if handle were curved a bit more. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eelpork Offchanskey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this ladle...easy to clean, right size serving and fits in drawere easily as well.Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. The handle is very ergonomic, light weight and ladles very well. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nursezig

product_meta.title: Silicone & Stainless Steel Black 4 Ounce Soup Ladle w/CoolGrip Handle & Flexedge Silicone by Cooler Kitchen (4 Oz)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackOur Silicone & Stainless Steel Ladle is perfect for all your kitchen needs. How often do you cook healthy and delicious soup for your family? If you’re like me, the answer is a lot – especially in the winter! It’s better to invest in a better piece of equipment, even for a few extra dollars, if it makes your life easier, helps prevent waste, and keeps your family healthier. 

Our ladle: 
- Consists of BPA FREE NON-STICK Silicone coating & COOLERGRIP stainless steel handle. Heat resistant to 450 degrees. 
- Our lightweight, sturdy & rugged design ensures that our ladle won’t bend or break & Long 13” COOLERGRIP handle won’t burn you in even the toughest of circumstances. 
- Our ladle is easy to clean and dishwasher safe. None of that yucky residue sticking to the insides of your ladle making it difficult to clean. 
- Its perfect design allows your soup to sit in the silicone ladle, and its revolutionary FlexEdge technology reduces drippings & helps get that last bit of soup from the bottom of the pot. 
- The handle has a convenient hook, so you can hang it, if you choose. 

AWESOME BONUS!! When You Purchase Our Ladle, You Will Receive A FREE COPY Of Our Cookbook "Cooking Is Awesome!" This Cookbook Includes Some Of Our FAVORITE RECIPES From Our Home Kitchen. 

Order Your Ladle Today, By Clicking The Orange Add-To Cart At The Top!
feature_bullets: OUR STRONG & STURDY LADLES ARE BUILT TO LAST - Flimsy nylon or plastic ladles can break or melt the first time you cook a large pot of thick soup for your family & can often be difficult to clean. What's the point of buying a ladle that will break or melt after a few months?

OUR LADLES ARE ALMOST INDISTRUCTABLE UNDER NORMAL USE - Instead of weak nylon or plastic, our ladles are made of sturdy STAINLESS STEEL and food grade BPA FREE NON-STICK SILICONE. They are also heat resistant up to 450 degrees, so you know they will not melt. EASY TO CLEAN - No need for intense scraping to remove excess residue. DISHWASHER SAFE!

OUR LADLE IS DESIGNED TO BE PERFECT - Each ladle has a 4 ounce (1/2 cup) scoop for portion control & measurement (great for portioning pancake batter too!). Each ladle contains a slight lip with angled handle for easy pouring and to prevent spilling. ALSO CONTAINS FLEXEDGE TECHNOLOGY - A slim & flexible silicone edge that allows you to scrape that last bit of soup from the bottom or sides of your pots without scratching. GET EVERY LAST DROP!

EXTRA LONG & THICK COOLERGRIP HANDLE - Cooler Kitchen's COOLERGRIP technology, ensures that even though the handle is made of durable stainless steel, it will NEVER EVER GET HOT TO THE TOUCH, no matter how long you accidentally leave it in the pot when cooking (We all do it! Why can't other ladles handle this??). Our handle is about 2 inches longer(13") and wider than most ladles. Weighted to PREVENT HAND CRAMPS! You'll wish all your kitchen tools had this handle!

Our Ladle - 13 inches long with COOLERGRIP thick stainless steel handle, Drip Minimizing FlexEdge ladle, with food grade BPA Free silicone. Easy to store or hang with HOOKED HANDLE. Great For Professional Or Restaurant Use! Soup & Stew Season Is Coming! Add to cart now!
